text.language: Qen pimah s~m/n n~e~hoou: nauyou/t e~qoun n~je nimay/t/c: naf,/ nemaf n~je Ywmac: nare nirwou ecsotem.
On the eighth day, the disciples were gathered, and Thomas was with them, the doors were shut.

language.div: Pada hari kedelapan, para murid berkumpul, dan Tomas bersama mereka, pintu-pintu terkunci.

text.language: فى اليوم الثامن كان التلاميذ مجتمعين ومعهم توما وكانت الأبواب مغلقة.
Afo~hi e~ratf qen toum/]: n~je Peno#c# I/#c# P,#c#: pejaf je t~hir/n/ nemwten: namenra] ouoh pejaf.
Our Lord Jesus Christ, stood in their midst, and said “Peace be to you, O my brothers” and he said.

language.div: Tuhan kita Yesus Kristus berdiri di tengah mereka dan berkata, "Damai sejahtera bagi kamu, hai saudara-saudara-Ku," dan Ia berkata,

text.language: ربنا يسوع المسيح وقف فى وسطهم وقال سلام لكم ياأحبائى وقال.
Ywmac ma pekt/b m~nai: ouoh a~nioui ntekjij: ,a tekjij qen pac~vir: m~pereraynah] alla nah].
“Thomas put your finger here, reach out your hand, place your hand on My side, do not doubt but believe.”

language.div: "Tomas, ulurkan jarimu ke sini, dan lihat tangan-Ku. Ulurkan tanganmu, dan letakkan di lambung-Ku. Jangan ragu, tetapi percayalah."

text.language: ياتوما هات أصبعك إلى هنا وضع يدك فى جنبى ولا تكن غير مؤمن بل مؤمناً.
Ywmac de afws e~bol: je Pao#c# ouoh Panou]: pejaf naf n~je I/#c#: aknau e~roi aknah].
Thomas proclaimed, “My Lord and my God,” Jesus said to him, “You see and you believe.”

language.div: Tomas berseru, "Ya Tuhanku dan Allahku." Yesus berkata padanya, "Kau percaya karena telah melihat."

text.language: فصرخ توما قائلا ربى والهى قال له يسوع لما رأيتنى آمنت.
Wounia~tou n~n/e~taun/ou: e~roi m~pounau aunah] e~roi: a~riten n~emp~sa n~tennah] e~rok: w~ Penn/b p~ouro P,#c#.
“But blessed are those who accept, and believe but have not seen,” make us worthy to believe in You, O our Master Christ the King.

language.div: "Berbahagialah mereka yang tak melihat, namun percaya." Buatlah kami layak untuk percaya pada-Mu, ya Kristus Raja kami dan Tuhan kami.

text.language: طوبى لمن يقبل إلى ويؤمن بى ولم يرانى أجعلنا مستحقين أن نؤمن بك ياسيدنا الملك المسيح.
Eybe vai tenoi n~ramao~: qen nia~gayon etj/k e~bol: qen ounah] tener'alin: enjw m~moc je all/louia.
Therefore we are rich, with perfect good things, and in faith we sing, saying Alleluia.

language.div: Karena itu kami diperkaya, dengan segala kebaikan sempurna, dan dengan iman kami bernyanyi, seraya berkata: Alleluia.

text.language: من أجل هذا نحن أغنياء بالخيرات الكاملة وبايمانٍ نرتل قائلين الليلويا.
All/louia all/louia: all/louia all/louia: I/#c# P,#c# p~ouro n~te p~w~ou: aftwnf e~bol qen n/eymwout.
Alleluia Alleluia, Alleluia Alleluia, Jesus Christ the King of Glory, is risen from the dead.

language.div: Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia, Alleluia. Yesus Kristus, Raja Kemuliaan, telah bangkit dari antara orang mati.

text.language: الليلويا الليلويا الليلويا الليلويا يسوع المسيح ملك المجد قام من بين الأموات.
